title: Digital Logic Design
subtitle: Explore syllabus, notes, diagrams, and more

topics.title: Number Systems & Conversions
topics.description: Binary, Octal, Decimal, Hexadecimal systems and conversions.
subtopics: Types of number systems: Binary (Base-2), Octal (Base-8), Decimal (Base-10), Hexadecimal (Base-16)
Conversions: Decimal ↔ Binary, Binary ↔ Octal, Binary ↔ Hexadecimal, Decimal ↔ Octal/Hexadecimal (via binary)
Binary arithmetic: Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, 1’s and 2’s Complement

topics.title: Boolean Algebra
topics.description: Learn Boolean laws, theorems, and simplification techniques.
subtopics: Laws and Theorems: Identity, Null, Idempotent, Inverse, Commutative, Associative, Distributive, DeMorgan’s Theorems
Boolean expressions: Simplification techniques, Duality principle
Canonical forms: Sum of Products (SOP), Product of Sums (POS)

topics.title: Logic Gates
topics.description: AND, OR, NOT, NAND, NOR, XOR, and XNOR gate operations.

topics.title: Combinational Circuits
topics.description: Design and analysis of multiplexers, decoders, encoders, and adders.
subtopics: Design and analysis of: Multiplexers (MUX), Demultiplexers (DEMUX), Encoders, Decoders, Half Adder & Full Adder, Subtractor

topics.title: Karnaugh Maps (K-Maps)
topics.description: Simplify Boolean expressions using 2, 3, and 4-variable K-Maps.
subtopics: Minimization of SOP and POS expressions

topics.title: Sequential Circuits
subtopics: Flip-Flops: SR, JK, D, T flip-flops, Truth tables and characteristic equations, Master-slave and edge-triggered types
Counters: Asynchronous (Ripple) counters, Synchronous counters, Up, Down, and Up/Down counters
Shift Registers: SISO, SIPO, PISO, PIPO, Applications

topics.title: Finite State Machines
topics.description: Design of Moore and Mealy machines.
subtopics: Design of: Moore Machines (Output depends on state), Mealy Machines (Output depends on state and input)
Applications in control circuits and pattern recognition
